application

Class SongViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.SongViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class SongViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class handles the Song View user interface. We are aware about how absurdly horrific this code is.

      • ltMouseClickMyPlaylists

        public void ltMouseClickMyPlaylists(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        action when the left mouse button is clicked while my playlists is selected. Either play music from the playlist, or do nothing if the playlist doesnt have any songs
        Parameters:
        event - - the left mouse is clicked

      • ltMouseClickCurrentPlayList

        public void ltMouseClickCurrentPlayList(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        action that occurs after the left mouse is clicked on the UserLibraryList while the current playlist is selected. Only action is to play songs
        Parameters:
        event - - the left mouse is clicked

      • rtMouseClickMySongs

        public void rtMouseClickMySongs(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        action that occurs when the right mouse is clicked on user library list while my songs is selected. menu pops up to either add the song to a playlist or remove the song from saved list
        Parameters:
        event - - right mouse button is clicked

      • rtMouseClickCurrentPlaylist

        action that occurs when the right mouse is clicked on the UserLibraryList while current playlist is selected. Only functionality is to remove songs
        Parameters:
        event - - user right mouse clicks
